content: this text is a legal document that outlines the agreements made between a married couple mr np and mrs ni who are getting a divorce by mutual consent they have made arrangements regarding the division of their property debts and assets they have renounced certain rights and benefits and have agreed not to cause harm to each other they have also made arrangements for the custody and residence of their minor children the costs and fees related to the divorce will be paid by mr np the agreements made in this document are binding on both parties and continue to be valid even after the divorce is finalized the parties have waived the need for divorce proceedings and have instead entered into provisional binding contracts they have filed a joint petition for divorce by mutual consent the notary involved in the process ensures that there are no conflicting interests and informs the parties of their rights and obligations the parties confirm their understanding and acceptance of the clauses in the agreement the text also mentions other legal actions related to the progress of the case such as the signing of deeds and the discharge of obligations the parties acknowledge that they have received and read the draft deed
